original_text: They might try to dig deep into the earth to save themselves. But my strong hand will pull them out of there. They might climb up into the sky. But I will pull them down from there.
korean_text: 그들이 파고 스올로 들어갈지라도 내 손이 거기에서 붙잡아 낼 것이요 하늘로 올라갈지라도 내가 거기에서 붙잡아 내릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: They might try to dig deep into the earth
But my strong hand will pull them out
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나의 강한 손이 그들을 끌어낼 것이다

sentences.original_text: They might climb up into the sky
But I will pull them down
